snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us about the ways that teachers in your school use technology, and how well you think it enhances what and how you learn.
abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us about the ways that teachers in your school use technology, and how well you think it enhances what and how you learn.
lead_paragraph: The Times is running a series of articles about the ways in which technology is changing the American classroom. Many teachers are now incorporating digital tools into their lessons, via interactive whiteboards, social media, class blogs and wikis, devices like cellphones or video cameras, or programs on computers or tablets.

headline.main: Do Your Teachers Use Technology Well?
